title: Messi scores in vital Argentina win over Mexico

title: Emotional Lewandowski fulfils World Cup dream
description: Robert Lewandowski says he knew time was running out to fulfil his dream of scoring at a World Cup finals, after netting in Poland's Group C win over Saudi Arabia on Saturday.

title: Kilcoo fend off Enniskillen to reach Ulster final
description: Kilcoo are through to the Ulster Club Football Final for the third year running after overcoming a brave Enniskillen Gaels comeback to win 3-14 to 1-9 in Saturday's semi-final.
